title: Looking for someone to edit montages for me! [D4 Streamer]
body:
Hey guys, I'm Gnarmy of One I am a streamer with a little over 100+ viewers and I'm seeking someone to make professional type montages with material from my streamers in the videos created.
If you have any experience making said montages please comment with:

Past Experiences with video editing:
Youtube: 
Examples: 

With other information such as names, payment (if needed) and other things on selection

Thank you and have a good day!

replies.body:
Hi there.
I'm a semi-pro/intermediate editor, i am interested in editing for you i have a past edits & have future projects of my own inline to be putout.
Below i have past & present edits created by myself i have taken a break from lol which is why i have more h1z1 content but have upgraded my editing skills since.
If you would like to contact me further please email at - Jadegg@live.com or add me on LoL (OCE) server IGN: 40 Ounce

Past Experiences with video editing:
(LoL:) #1 https://youtu.be/uRPu1N5zT5c #2 https://youtu.be/2aGPU2VzO94
(H1Z1:) #1 https://youtu.be/UoCTcm2skew #2 https://youtu.be/LIzq82InVqQ #3 https://youtu.be/p517xqitxNA

Youtube: #1 https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCrXnprCinCl62vSeBsyZqqg #2 https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvg7tD2RDkDsBWShOcy6xHg

Regards
-Jade

Hey there ^-^

I'd be interested in applying for this in order to help you! I'm a Gold/Plat player in NA, and a Silver player in OCE. Unfortunately,  I don't really have any experience with editing to show, as I've only messed around on Sony Vegas and Adobe After Effects. I don't claim to be the best editor, but I'll try my best if you would like me to help you. Onviously,  with my limited skills I would not be asking for money, I'd solely be doing it for the experience. Thanks for taking the time to read this, and if you need to know anything just ask me. Have a great day!

Yours sincerely, 
Talwyn

Hey mate!
 
I've added you on league and I wouldn't mind talking with you about all this in a more real time matter!
I'll give you a few things to start off with if this takes off and we'll see what you're made of!

From, 
Gnarmy
